column5: Picked this up at the Sportsman show. Thinking it would be ideal for leaches that I want to try this year.  Easy to pull them out of the water. $25 all in bait2go.ca
Very cool. Probably going to get one of these for ice fishing trips where I have to backpack in to the lake.

Picked this up at the Sportsman show. Thinking it would be ideal for leaches that I want to try this year. Easy to pull them out of the water. $25 all in bait2go.ca  Seen these,never gave them much thought,as I dont use live bait. Cool though.     http://bait2go.ca
Thanks for the tip. Grabbed one of these yesterday. Pretty excited to use it.
Send me some pictures of you using the bait bucket and I will post on my site www.bait2go.ca [emailÂ protected] Kevin Bain
